Thanks Misty! I will look into that.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: bulletbabea 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, August 20,=
 2009 5:03 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: The nature of things!


    April yo=
u might be interested in researching some others who are/were involved in E=
VP-ITC communication. Marcello Bacci, Hans Otto Koenig, George Meek, Ernst =
Senkowski, Adolph Holmes, Sonia Rinaldi, just to name a few. Researchers ac=
ross the world explore this in great detail.

  Many experiments are done w=
ith that idea in mind such as the spiricom experiemnts past and present, di=
rect voice communications, Frank's box, and various other methods.

  Frank=
 R just pointed out a great video that was posted interviewing Dr. Ernst Se=
nkowski in which he gives an interesting viewpoint and some what he says mi=
rrors my own point of view as well as info being given via EVP on many topi=
cs. He also speaks about some of the various researchers he knew.

  http:/=
/vimeo.com/5637666

  There is so much going on in the world that most peop=
le in the USA have very little knowledge of simply because they do not spea=
k the language that the info is being presented in. There are some videos o=
f other researchers on the web as well and if you can get past the language=
 differences you may find some of their work to be very fascinating.

  Mis=
ty

  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "April Abercrombie" <april@...> wrote=
:
  >
  > Oh-to answer your first question-Solid proof for me would be an i=
ntelligent, back and forth conversation. It would also have to be VERY clea=
r and many people would have to say they hear the same thing.
  > 
  > ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  > From: purplespacefriend 
  > To: EVP-ITC@yaho=
ogroups.com 
  > Sent: Thursday, August 20, 2009 3:35 PM
  > Subject: [EVP-=
ITC] Re: The nature of things!
  > 
  > 
  > So what constitutes proof? All=
 I know for certain is that something talks by using the bits of audio from=
 radio stations as the tunign is swept. However, it can not be proven what =
it is that's talking, so I guess that makes the whole thing invalid of litt=
le use. 
  > 
  > Frank-S
  > 
  > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "April A=
bercrombie" <april@> wrote:
  > >
  > > "Just because speech is all percept=
ion does not make invalid--that even normal speech is highly subjective. If=
 you used the rules of these scienctists, you couldn't even trust what the =
guy sitting next to you was saying. You couldn't trust what you were hearin=
g!"
  > > 
  > > You're right....and I don't LOL! All I hope to be able to =
do is find proof of actual spirit communication. I don't care so much about=
 what is being communicated, only that it is.
  > > 
  > > ----------------=
------------------------------------------
  > > 
  > > 
  > > "Even it was=
 all imagination, that does not make it invalid or useless. It's still serv=
es as personal insight. "
  > > 
  > > I absolutely agree.
  > > 
  > > ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
  > > From: purplespacefriend 
  > > To: EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.com 
  > > Sent: Thursday, August 20, 2009 7:55 AM
  > > Subje=
ct: [EVP-ITC] Re: The nature of things!
  > > 
  > > 
  > > I think the min=
d is not physical, and it's only these paranoid scientist types that try to=
 bully everyone into that extrememly narrow thinking that everything experi=
enced is physical phenomenon only, and must be made to fit into that contex=
t. 
  > > 
  > > Just because speech is all perception does not make invali=
d--that even normal speech is highly subjective. If you used the rules of t=
hese scienctists, you couldn't even trust what the guy sitting next to you =
was saying. You couldn't trust what you were hearing!
  > > 
  > > Percepti=
on is everything. How is it that just before some mass death thing, like a =
plane crash or some disaster I see the shadows shift, it should not be poss=
ible, but never the less, I've seen it happen over and over. These scientif=
ic types brain wash everyone into not looking at clouds as you might imagin=
e you see something--well a day or two before tornados in other states I se=
e circles in the clouds here-hundreds of miles away. People see me looking =
up and look at me like I'm insane because of these bully skeptics. You're n=
ot allowed to perceive anything unless they tell you it's ok. You can't loo=
k at clouds, and you can't listen to voices fragments, cuz they can't expla=
in away the perceptions. These scientist types are too brain dead to realiz=
e they too create thier reality-all those supposed new particals did not ex=
ist before someone theorized about them, then they are created and "discove=
red". 
  > > 
  > > Even it was all imagination, that does not make it inva=
lid or useless. It's still serves as personal insight. 
  > > 
  > > frank-=
S
  > > 
  > > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@> =
wrote:
  > > >
  > > > Assumptions and expectations!? I hear a lot of both =
of these concepts in your words and when mentioning your research. Cognitiv=
e functioning or processing sensory information in order to come to a concl=
usion or judgement is how we function in this world. In order for your mind=
 to understand this physical world you live in it automatically makes certa=
in assumptions about sensory information it takes in. Your eyes expect to s=
ee objects oriented correctly, with the correct color, lighting, reflectivi=
ty and shading, and you expect there size and shape to be within scale comp=
ared to other objects. My point is your senses have a range, which implies =
limitations. Since this is correct for your senses it is also correct for y=
our ability to understand perspectives with any wide ranging diversity. You=
 are able to see and process the information of our physical world just as =
any other human being does. That is great for a human but why would you thi=
nk for a second,
  > > > you could understand the perspective of a mind and=
 voice that speaks through a radio from some unknown location.
  > > > 
  >=
 > > The information you receive from the other side of your radios or even=
 from thin air through EVP's could be completely correct and true no matter=
 what the context because you don't know what perspective it is coming from=
. You are making a lot of unfounded assumptions about the (dare I say) bein=
gs or worlds they exist in and have a lot of expectations about the informa=
tion you receive. You are looking for answers to the wrong questions! Quit =
assuming that these entities know you or the people around you. Quit assumi=
ng they are here for your entertainment as a personal fortune teller. Quit =
expecting them to know answers to question they may have themselves (just b=
ecause they aren't physical doesn't mean they know everything). Don't assum=
e you will be speaking to a dead relative or someone you once knew. Go to a=
 fortune teller if you want information about the furture. If you are serio=
us about researching these voices and the equipment used to record them
  >=
 > > then ask the right questions. 
  > > > 
  > > > If you have a box made=
 by Frank then ask Frank how the different circuits work, what is the purop=
ose of some of the options, why is the RVG better or worse than a circuit w=
ithout it? You have a unique situation here where the inventor of an import=
ant piece of equipment is willing to share the most minute details of how i=
t works without a price tag attached. Some of the other box variations are =
sold by one person but created by someone else and usually based on some lo=
ose design similar to Frank's. The other equipment made by Bill Chapp and o=
thers will probably stay a mystery because they are sold for profit. Most p=
eople who use the different "hacks" know how to make them but don't know mu=
ch about electronic theory or the behavior of radio waves to understand how=
 they work.
  > > > 
  > > > Point is you have plenty of questions to ask t=
he human's who have built the equipment you are using before you can even b=
egin to ask questions of the entities you are communicating with.
  > > > 
=
  > > > Regards,
  > > > 
  > > > Frank R.
  > > >
  > >
  >
